content:
IndexAction<T> Class

Definition

Represents an index action that operates on a document.

In this Article

public class IndexAction<T> : Microsoft.Azure.Search.Models.IndexActionBase<T> where T : class

Type Parameters

T

The CLR type that maps to the index schema. Instances of this type can be stored as documents in the index.
Inheritance
Object
IndexActionBase<T>
IndexAction<T>

Inherited Members

ActionType
Document
